newsitem.title: USA: Latin Trade magazine creates conference division.
newsitem.headline: Latin Trade magazine creates conference division.

text.p: Reflecting Miami's position as a hub of Latin American business, Latin Trade magazine said on Thursday it had created a conference division to meet the increased demand for information on business opportunities in the region.

"Our readers have long asked us for forums where they could gather to understand and analyze the intricacies of economic growth in Latin America and the Caribbean," publisher Lynn Roberts said in a statement. "Latin Trade Forums will provide that platform."
Mica Parks de Uribe, former director of the Economist Conference's Latin American Regional Manager's Club and former manager of Latin Finance's conference division, will head the project.
